ti:work.ti:title: Maxime Cum Principibus Viris Philosopho Esse Disserendum

ti:translation.ti:label: That a Philosopher Ought to Converse Especially with Men in Power
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Moralia, Vol. X. Fowler, Harold North, translator. Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press. London: William Heinemann Ltd. 1936 (printing).

ti:translation.ti:label: That a Philosopher Ought Chiefly to Converse with Great Men
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarch's Morals, Vol. II. Goodwin, William W., editor; Chetwood, Knightley, translator. Boston: Little, Brown, and Company. Cambridge. 1874.

ti:edition.ti:label: Περὶ τοῦ ὅτι μάλιστα τοῖς ἡγεμόσι δεῖ τὸν φιλοσοφόν διαλέγεσθαι
ti:edition.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarchi Chaeronensis Moralia, Vol V. Vernardakēs, Grēgorios N., editor. Leipzig: Teubner. 1893.
